word_mean: 内陷：逐渐内陷的过程或情况，胚胎学上指(i)单层中空球形的囊胚陷入形成杯状双层壁的原肠胚
(ii)从表面至组织深层不断加深的小凹，发育成憩室或小管

sentence.Network_en: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of MRI on basilar invagination.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:探讨MRI对颅底凹陷症的诊断价值.

sentence.Network_en: Methods MRI features of 14 cases of basilar invagination were analyzed retrospectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法:回顾性分析14例临床证实的颅底凹陷症的MRI表现.

sentence.Network_en: The internal lamellae originate from an invagination of the inner of double membranes surround the plastid.
sentence.Network_cn: 片层起源于围着质体双层膜的内膜向内折伸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...表层细胞为单位整体向外周扩展将胚胎深层细胞包绕起来。2、内陷(invagination)，胚胎某一区域内的细胞同时向内凹入形成凹陷.

...IgA和IgE选择性缺乏,周围血淋巴细胞减少,气脑造影见小脑萎缩, 3鉴别诊断,一,颅底陷入症,basilar invagination,为先天性畸形,绝大多数在成年后起病,临床症状与畸形程度可不一致,病情多进展缓慢,但呈进行性加重,主.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin invaginatio(n-), based on in- 'into' + Latin vagina 'sheath'

means.word_mean: 1. the condition of being folded inward or sheathed
2. the folding in of an outer layer so as to form a pocket in the surface;
